name: Files Agent
description: File system navigator that helps browse directories, find files, and manage file operations

mcp_tools.name: tabz_click
mcp_tools.description: Click on folders to expand/collapse or files to select them

mcp_tools.name: tabz_screenshot
mcp_tools.description: Capture the current file tree state

mcp_tools.name: tabz_get_page_info
mcp_tools.description: Get information about the current page state

selectors.description: Folder items in the file tree
selectors.example: Click to expand folder: tabz_click selector='[data-tabz-item="folder-src"]'

selectors.description: File items in the file tree
